duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform general patient care and preliminary physical tests as directed by clinical protocols.
Greet and prepare patients, record vital signs, and obtain patient medical history.
Administer medications and vaccines, draw blood samples, and prepare specimens for lab analysis.
Schedule patients for diagnostic testing and communicate test results and care plans.
Maintain patient exam rooms, sterilize instruments, and document patient information in medical records.
Escalate non-routine issues to healthcare provider, ensure safety checklists/quality controls, and protect patient privacy rights.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent, Certified Medical Assistant (CMA) certification, and Basic Life Support (BLS) certified (or obtained within 3 months of hire).
